p: Our phylogenetic analysis further shows that virus genomes recovered from the 2019 cases all belong to genotype III (also known as American/Asian genotype). Notably, our analysis strongly supports (approximate likelihood ratio test = 1.00) the clustering of the2019 DENV2 cases from Brazil (18 of the 19 sequences collected in 2019) into a single monophyletic group (named here as DENV2-III BR-4), which is the result of a new and recent introduction of DENV2-III from outside of Brazil [ Supplementary data (Fig. 2)]. In addition, two sequences from São José do Rio Preto, one sampled in June 2017 (ID: 126) and another in January 2019 (ID: 140) grouped with the isolates from a previous clade circulating since 2006 in the Southeast region (BR-3).
